website_summaries.verdict: A wearable pool alarm that is designed to alert you if your pet accidentally falls into your pool.
pros: This device attaches to your pet's collar
The alarm is triggered when the wearable device gets wet
This set includes the Safety Turtle base and can be expanded to include additional wearable devices for other pets or ones that are designed for children, if needed
cons: Depending on how active your pet is, the straps might require some ingenuity and tinkering to get them to remain on

customer_reviews.title: Considering cost, I’m disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product is lacking in 2 respects. 1) the turtles are Uber sensitive to the point that if the dogs are licking each other or happen to go out after rain, the siren goes off. 2) the side brackets that hold the strap (see pic) break easily and render the turtle useless. Perhaps they be metal?
customer_reviews.author: FeitclubTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: After having our elderly schnauzer drowned in our pool, we purchased this for our other 2 dogs. They don’t show interest in the pool, but neither did he. We just feel better knowing they have them on if they accidentally fall in. The only annoying thing is that it occasionally goes off when the dogs are playing and the big one mouths the smaller ones neck. On the other hand, it is good to know that such a small amount of moisture sets it off. Bite the bullet and spend the money. Better safe than sorry!
customer_reviews.author: mat james

customer_reviews.title: Works with Amazon Alexa
customer_reviews.text: This device is so easy to attach to my dogs collars. The alarm is piercing, and the alarm is quickly triggered when the turtle device comes in contact with water. I attached the base unite to a wifi smart plug so that I can quickly ask Alexa to activate and deactivate the Safety Turtles.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy T.

customer_reviews.title: The alarm is exactly the same as a smoke alarm.
customer_reviews.text: I have an old dog and a pool, so I need it in case she falls in. Itworks but lots of false alarms. the alarm sounds just exactly like my smoke alarm, which is unfortunate. I think the new model is not as good as the old model.
customer_reviews.author: R. Corder

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a peace of mind!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these turtles. Shortly after installing my new pool, my lab fell in. Thankfully, I was outside when it happened and was able to get her out of the pool. I immediately started searching the internet for something to alert me if she fell in again. These turtles have given a peace of mind while my dogs are outside. I can finally relax!!!! I highly recommend getting these turtles for all fur-babies if you have an in ground pool.
customer_reviews.author: Heather G

customer_reviews.title: New house old dog
customer_reviews.text: My wife and sue it’s got a new house with a pool. We have two dogs one of them getting old and slow. He is losing his eyesight and we were worried he was going to accidentally fall in and not be able to get out. I looked at a ton of things for this problem but this looked like the best choice. While nether of our dogs have fallen in the pool my wife likes to pull them in against those will. We have made these go off numerous times and they are working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Goldblum

customer_reviews.title: Don't rely on this device for your pet or child's safety
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. My 16 yr old blind dog fell in our new pool and the alarm did not go off, even though it worked previously when I tested it. Fortunately I was sitting right there and got him out right away. It seems the one receiver is defective since the other one works but I really can't trust it. Will try to get the receiver replaced while I look for another option. Really cheaply made for the price too.
customer_reviews.author: Lins D

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Easy to put on my dogs ' collars and is sensitive enough to detect small amounts of liquid. It even sets the alarm off when my dogs are playing and one of them licks it by mistake. The only thing negative I can say about this is the alarm isn't as loud as I would like. If I was outside in my driveway and the dogs fell in the pool in the back yard, I wouldn't be able to hear the alarm going off in the house. But it's plenty loud if I'm in the house.
customer_reviews.author: nichole e.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost a GREAT product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, our new dog slipped into the deeper end of the pool the very first day we let him in the back yard and the alarm worked perfectly. Very impressive, i highly recommend this sensor to anyone who has a pool and pets. one improvement would be change the alarm tone, it is loud enough but sounds like our smoke alarm, a pulsating sound would be an improvement. This is a minor thing overall we love the product
customer_reviews.author: David Lee

customer_reviews.title: Saved Litte Buddy
customer_reviews.text: The device is easy to attach to a dog collar, as it is velcro based. Our blind and deaf dog hates being trapped inside and still loves wandering in the backyard with the pool. Until recently he avoided the pool, but he's accidentally fallen in a few times now. He fell in with the Turtle on his collar and the alarm sounded off inside the house as loud as our security alarm. We were able to scoop him up within seconds. Highly recommend for saving an outdoor dog's life. It was worth every penny to not stress out about him falling in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie S.

customer_reviews.title: Saved my Barclay's life!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old Westie is losing his sight and fell into our pool two days after we installed this new turtle alarm. My precious friend was grabbed from the water when the alarm sounded! We had the older version but replaced it with this one when it broke. Needless to say, We are glad we ordered this new one when we did. It definitely saved his life! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Smith

customer_reviews.title: Your kids and pets safety is important
customer_reviews.text: After a close call for my loved yorkie in the pool, i needed a alarm monitor. Ran across the safety turtle and very glad i did. Very happy with it and can feel more at ease with the dogs safety around the pool. Keep eyes and ears open and have a great summer.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Fulkersin

customer_reviews.title: They work well and alarm is loud.
customer_reviews.text: These have saved my blind dogs life several times! I love them!!!! Both my dogs wear them on their collars all the time since they have a dog door and can go out to the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These work!
customer_reviews.text: Have these on our two dogs so we have have peace of mind when they are in the yard since we have a swimming pool! They work great! Sometimes wet grass might set it off; but I’d much rather them be very sensitive to moisture & water in case our dog fell in the pool!
customer_reviews.author: kenneth r.

customer_reviews.title: FABulous product!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd Safety Turtle. Our 1st one lasted about 10 years I want to say. Way longer than we ever expected. We've NEVER had a problem with the original one and that's why decided to stick with the same product. This new one is way smaller and I love that feature. Awesome product and I feel safe with my dog having it on.
customer_reviews.author: frank w rudolphi

customer_reviews.title: This is a life saver!
customer_reviews.text: Used zip ties to fasten to my two dogs collars. I've tested them a few times. The alarm sounds quickly and loud every time. Alarm turns off quickly with reset button. For those whose dog could fall in a pool, this is a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: B. Glidewell

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Did not alarm when I got it wet. I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Robin L. King

customer_reviews.title: Pet safety
customer_reviews.text: This has alerted me multiple times of my dogs in the pool. I wish I had this two years ago.
customer_reviews.author: susan leitch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Safety device
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Loud alarm. Great buy for kids or pets
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Borntrager

customer_reviews.title: Great product idea
customer_reviews.text: I had my pup for six months. I bought this and the next day she fell in the pool and would have drowned but for this. Who would have thought! Best investment I have made. She is an expensive Frenchie
customer_reviews.author: Lary Wadley

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Really works. It will also go off if your dog chews on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a way to keep our puppy safe in our backyard, which has an ingrown pool. He loves to swim, but he's not so great at swimming yet. This works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They Do Work
customer_reviews.text: Well...after a false start and complete replacement of the system, the Turtles are working like a champ and literally saved my little guys life a day after I put it on him. Make sure you test the unit regularly. The good news is that DIY and SafetyTurtle honor their commitments made. They were great to work with on the replacement. Now I have a greater sense of peace knowing I will be alerted.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey F. Kays

customer_reviews.title: These stopped working within a week of putting them on ...
customer_reviews.text: These stopped working within a week of putting them on my dogs. I am very unhappy with this purchase. And to top it off I missed the return window by one day. :-(
customer_reviews.author: wendy B Gardner

customer_reviews.title: It works, however, if another dog licks the ...
customer_reviews.text: It works, however, if another dog licks the collar or the dog goes through sprinkler, it goes off. If there was a way to secure the turtle on top of neck more securely, that would eliminate the sensor of going off so often.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Ohman

customer_reviews.title: does off
customer_reviews.text: it does go off when it shouldn't, which can scare you if you don't know where the dog it. ugh
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Fulcher

customer_reviews.title: False Alarms
customer_reviews.text: Product works as advertised but we get one false alarm every day. When we get the false alarm our dog is sleeping on couch......if this is ok then this product will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Bill R.

customer_reviews.title: Alarm unit needs a 100% unobstructed view of the pool.
customer_reviews.text: Requirement of an unobstructed view of the pool was explained in product paperwork, Never saw this mentioned on the website. Too late, needs to be returned. Also too bad, because it works great on the parts of the pool it can "see"
customer_reviews.author: David L Benkoff

product_meta.title: Safety Turtle New 2.0 Pet Immersion Pool/Water Alarm Kit - 2 Petbands
product_meta.description: The perfect way to know if your pet is in the pool! Even if pets can swim, they often have trouble finding the steps to get out. The Safety Turtle Pet Kit includes the Safety Turtle base, always watching the pool and the Velcro strap with a Safety Turtle to attach to your pets collar. If they go in the water, the alarm will sound to alert you. You can add as many pet adapters or child wristbands to a system as needed. Works in salt water pools. It's simple, reliable and easy to use! You can have as many wristbands as needed (for guests)...and your pets can utilize the very same system. The family dog wears a Turtle attached by a pet adapter, onto his collar. The kids and family pets can all be on the same system. The best part is you can take it with you to friends or vacation homes! There is no programming or wiring...just plug in and you're ready! Works in salt water pools.
feature_bullets: This is a Pet kit not for children. look for Child kit in another listing if you need for children.
Not backward compatible. Will not work with old T101 bands.
Can add multiple child and pet turtle bands to one system

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars60 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
